about_the_game:
【About the game】

”Marquee Candle“ is a bullet hell action game. A girl named Zi Sheng finds herself in a mysterious alternate dimension.

This strange place is filled with dangers, yet it seems to hold fragments of her lost memories.

Will she be able to recover her past and uncover the story from that era?

【Gameplay】

——Hostile Ghosts: The ghosts inhabiting this alternate dimension are not friendly, their attacks will put you in danger! Move and jump skillfully to avoid the bullet patterns they shoot at you.

——Obstacles: Sometimes, the ghosts will create obstacles on your path, blocking your way. Use the gifted mysterious flowers to enter the ghost realm, where these obstacles can no longer hinder you.

——Traps and Mechanisms: The alternate dimension is filled with various traps, each requiring a different approach. Protect yourself and progress through the levels, gradually unraveling the mysteries of the bond between the girls.

——Memory Fragments: Collect four large fragments and eight smaller ones scattered throughout the levels to unlock lost memories.

As you piece together these memories, the intertwined pasts of the girls will gradually unfold……

【Game Features】

■ Story-driven Exploration: Follow the protagonist as she collects memories and uncovers the mystery of her identity, immersing yourself in an adventure that tells the story between two girls.

■ Art and Atmosphere: The game boasts excellent visual design, with a highly atmospheric alternate dimension setting, beautiful CG artwork, and charming characters.

■ Original Soundtracks: The game features original musics which enhance the experience of dodging bullets to the rhythm, adding both fun and auditory enjoyment.

■ Difficulty Options: Whether you're a beginner or seeking a challenge, the game offers levels from easy to hard, allowing you to choose the difficulty that suits you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2200G+ or Intel Core 8100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or Intel Core 9400f
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580 8G / GTX 1660ti or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
